Class DevelopmentCardDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedDevelopmentCardDeck
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.DevelopmentCardDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DevelopmentCardDeck
extends RedDevelopmentCardDeck
DevelopmentCardDeck Class defines methods to be used on Development Card Deck objects inside the Model.

    • drawCard

      public DevelopmentCard drawCard() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Draws a card from the deck and updates the deck's length. If the deck is empty, a new exception is thrown indicating the absence of cards in the deck.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
